title: Fork, ca. 1790
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Fork has two flat pointed tines, bending outwards. Baluster stem. Handle flaring towards the end, with wooden scales engraved with rozettes, inlaid brass dots in the centre. Panels inlaid with brass cross on front and back. Tang edges decorated with scroll pattern. End of handle covered with engraved brass and brass finial with eight loose rings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fork, ca. 1790.
ca. 1790. steel, wood (?), brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-47.
